    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
    int t,d,count,i,k;
    string s1,s2;
    int c1[30]={0};
    int c2[30]={0};
    map<char,int> mp;
    map<char,int> mq;
    	cin>>t;
    	while(t--)
    	{	count=0;
    		cin>>s1>>s2>>d;
    		char x='a';
    		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
    	{
    		mp[x]=0;
    		mq[x]=0;
    		x++;
    	}
    		for(i=0;i<s1.size();i++)
    		{
    			mp[s1[i]]++;
    		}
    		for(i=0;i<s2.size();i++)
    		{
    			mq[s2[i]]++;
    		}
    		k=0;
    			 map<char,int> :: iterator it;
    			 for(it=mp.begin();it!=mp.end();it++)
    		 {
    		     c1[k]=it->second;
    		     k++;
    		 }
    		 k=0;
    		 	 for(it=mq.begin();it!=mq.end();it++)
    		 {
    		     c2[k]=it->second;
    		     k++;
    		 }
    		 for(i=0;i<26;i++)
    		 {
    		 	if(c1[i]>=c2[i])
    		 	count=count+c1[i]-c2[i];
    		 	else
    		 	count=count+c2[i]-c1[i];
    		 }
    		 //cout<<count;
    		if(count<=d)
    		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    		else
    		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
